title: karuNai puriya vENum
sahitya:
karuNai puriya vENum oru kaDugaLavEnum marudagiri mEl uraiyum murugA enakku nI


anupallavi

  paripUrNamAi unadu pAdamE tAn gatiyenru karudi varum enadu kavalai yAvum agala nI


caraNam    cancalat-tApam mida minjiyE manam tunji tanjam unai aDaivOrai dayaiyuDan aNaivOnE
nenjam nI negizha kenjugirEn konjam anjalenrE un abhaya karam kATTum
